{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11a/b/g/n/ac WLAN |caption2 = + Bluetooth PCI-E/SDIO NGFF 2230 Card |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Broadcom_BCM94371ZAE |wikipedia = |brand = Broadcom |model = BCM94371ZAE |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/15/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Broadcom_BCM94371ZAE |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = SDIO |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = M.2 |formfactor = 2230 |vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 440d |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1090 |icid = 4324A-BRCM1090 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4371E;BCM4371EKUBG; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [[brcmfmac]] |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U98H130 |manuf_rev = .01 |addchip = |flags = Bluetooth |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = Yes |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/29/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== From the FCC documents... * ''802.11a/b/g/n/ac, HT20/HT40/VHT20/VHT40/VHT80, WLAN (2TX, 2RX)'' * ''Bluetooth 4.0 BR/EDR/LE, (1TX,1RX), Chain1'' ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2888816 ''FCC SAR Test Report'']) * Multiple modules are covered by this FCC ID. ** BCM94371Z (EUT1) - M.2 (E Key) PCIe/USB interface ** BCM94371Z (EUT2) - M.2 (E Key) PCIe/USB/SDIO/UART ** BCM94371ZAE (EUT3) - M.2 (A/E Key) PCIe/USB === Noted use of this reference design === * [[Foxconn]] U98H130.00 (CoO: China), BCM94371ZAEH1 ** HP P/N: 843224-001, SPS#/#SA: 8435490-001, HW: 13, FW: 01 ** OUIs: A8:A7:95, 30:F7:72 (Eng. Sample) * [[Foxconn]] U98H130.01 (CoO: China), BCM94371ZAEH3 ** HP P/N: 849915-001, SPS#/#SA: 849915-001, HW: 14, FW: 01 ** OUIs: 44:1C:A8 ([https://www.zipy.co.il/p/אליאקספרס/broadcom-bcm94371zae-bcm94371-bcm4371-802-11-ac-ngff-m2-867mbps-wifi-bluetooth-4-1-combo-sps-843549-001-wireless-network-card/32814945050/ label]) ==Notes== ==Software support== === Linux support === BCM4317x is supported by [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcmfmac]. [https://patchwork.kernel.org/patch/7397861/]. [http://lists.alioth.debian.org/pipermail/kernel-svn-changes/2015-December/021592.html ''brcm80211: include Broadcom BCM4371 firmware'' on the ''debian-kernel'' mailing list] 
+ brcm/brcmfmac4371-pcie.bin
 longdesc: wireless network cards supported 
 by the brcmsmac or brcmfmac driver
+ use_fw bcm4371-bt-uart (brcm/BCM4371C2)
+ use_fw bcm4371-sdio
{{SCollapse|iw phy |
iw phy
Wiphy phy0
	max # scan SSIDs: 10
	max scan IEs length: 2048 bytes
	max # sched scan SSIDs: 16
	max # match sets: 16
	max # scan plans: 1
	max scan plan interval: 508
	max scan plan iterations: 0
	Retry short limit: 7
	Retry long limit: 4
	Coverage class: 0 (up to 0m)
	Device supports roaming.
	Available Antennas: TX 0 RX 0
	Supported interface modes:
		 * IBSS
		 * managed
		 * AP
		 * P2P-client
		 * P2P-GO
		 * P2P-device
	Band 1:
		Capabilities: 0x1022
			HT20/HT40
			Static SM Power Save
			RX HT20 SGI
			No RX STBC
			Max AMSDU length: 3839 bytes
			DSSS/CCK HT40
		Maximum RX AMPDU length 65535 bytes (exponent: 0x003)
		Minimum RX AMPDU time spacing: 16 usec (0x07)
		HT TX/RX MCS rate indexes supported: 0-15
		Frequencies:
			* 2412 MHz [1] (20.0 dBm)
			* 2417 MHz [2] (20.0 dBm)
			* 2422 MHz [3] (20.0 dBm)
			* 2427 MHz [4] (20.0 dBm)

	Band 2:

		HT TX/RX MCS rate indexes supported: 0-15

			Max MPDU length: 3895
			Supported Channel Width: neither 160 nor 80+80
			short GI (80 MHz)
			SU Beamformer
			SU Beamformee

			1 streams: MCS 0-9
			2 streams: MCS 0-9
			3 streams: not supported
			4 streams: not supported
			5 streams: not supported
			6 streams: not supported
			7 streams: not supported
			8 streams: not supported
		VHT RX highest supported: 0 Mbps
		VHT TX MCS set:
			1 streams: MCS 0-9
			2 streams: MCS 0-9
			3 streams: not supported
			4 streams: not supported
			5 streams: not supported
			6 streams: not supported
			7 streams: not supported
			8 streams: not supported
		VHT TX highest supported: 0 Mbps
		Frequencies:
			* 5170 MHz [34] (disabled)
			* 5180 MHz [36] (20.0 dBm) (no IR)

			* 5320 MHz [64] (20.0 dBm) (no IR, radar detection)

	valid interface combinations:
		 * #{ managed } <= 1, #{ P2P-device } <= 1, #{ P2P-client, P2P-GO } <= 1,
		   total <= 3, #channels <= 2
		 * #{ managed } <= 1, #{ AP } <= 1, #{ P2P-client } <= 1, #{ P2P-device } <= 1,
		   total <= 4, #channels <= 1
}} ===Windows support=== [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci/14e4/440d/ Possibly useful link @ '''DriverAgent'''], which appears to link to some .cab files available from Windows Update [[Category:English Documentation]]
